title: Oxford Artificial Intelligence Programme
description: This programme is designed for managers, business leaders, and technical professionals. It covers AI mechanics, potential, challenges, social implications, and ethics, providing a comprehensive understanding of AI and machine learning.

title: Oxford Executive Diploma in Artificial Intelligence for Business
description: This diploma programme equips executives and technical specialists with tools to ethically leverage AI in their organisations. It includes modules on technological disruption, big data and machine learning, AI in practice, and strategic leadership.

title: Technology and AI: Online Courses
platform: Oxford University Department for Continuing Education
description: These online courses offer flexible learning options covering various aspects of AI and technology. They are designed for professionals and those with prior knowledge of AI.
